parameter & default_value (const boost::any &value)
 Define parameter's default value.
parameter & default_value (const char *value)
 Define parameter's default value. Overloaded for const char* arguments, because boost::any cannot be initialized by array.
parameter & order (size_t order_num)
 Set order number for this parameter. Need for "unnamed using" (this parameter can input without name). Order number _must_ be uniq for parameters.

Data Fields

parameter_name name
 Parameter's name.
bool is_necessary
 Necessity flag. If it true, this parameter _must_ be in command line.
bool has_def_value
 Default value flag. If it true, this parameter can be missing.
boost::any for_arg
 arg_holder for parameters with value;
sig_type sig
 Signal for callback correspond function. Must be used for parameters without value.
value_semantic value_s
 Value's semantis label.
size_t order_number
 Order number for this parameter. Need for "unnamed using" of this parameter (you can input it without name).

Static Public Attributes

static orders_storage orders
 Storage for order numbers of parameters. Need for unique-check of orders.

Detailed Description

Command line parameter.

Presents one command line parameter with necessary options.
